text: Otakar Černý (10 September 1943 – February 2021) was a Czech sports journalist and television presenter. In 1969, he began working for Czechoslovak Television, which would become Česká televize. After the fall of Czechoslovakia, he moderated the television programs Debata and Co týden dal. He became a spokesperson for the Czech Ministry of Health from 2000 to 2002. He was then editor-in-chief of Redakce sportu. Otakar Černý died in February 2021 at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Czech journalists Category:Czech television presenters
title: Otakar Černý
